sources.title: The Woman Hunter (1972)
sources.description: A wealthy woman, vacationing in Acapulco with her stuffy husband, stumbles upon evidence that she is being stalked by an international jewel thief and murderer. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-woman-hunter-1972/

sources.title: The Woman Hunter (1972) BARBARA EDEN
sources.description:
Stars: Barbara Eden, Robert Vaughn, Stuart Whitman
Director: Bernard L. Kowalski

A woman vacationing with her husband in Mexico discovers she is being stalked by an international killer.

metadata.Plot: A woman vacationing with her husband in Mexico discovers she is being stalked by an international killer.
